statements: SELECT * FROM signature_features WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT signature_feature1, signature_feature3 FROM signature_features WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM signature_features WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, signature_feature2 FROM signature_features WHERE signature_feature1 LIKE '%important%';
SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM signature_features;
SELECT user_id, signature_feature1, signature_feature2 FROM signature_features WHERE signature_feature3='value1' ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, signature_feature2, signature_feature3 FROM signature_features WHERE signature_feature1='value2' ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM signature_features WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT signature_feature1, signature_feature3 FROM signature_features ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT user_id, signature_feature1, created_at FROM signature_features WHERE signature_feature2='value3' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT signature_data FROM signature_features WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN signature_features ON users.signature_id = signature_features.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (3, 5);
SELECT * FROM signature_features WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT feature_name FROM signature_features WHERE feature_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, feature_name FROM signature_features ORDER BY user_id DESC, feature_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_features FROM signature_features GROUP BY user_id HAVING user_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT signature_id, signature_data FROM signatures;
SELECT feature_id, feature_name FROM signature_features ORDER BY feature_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT signature_id, signature_data FROM signatures ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT feature_name, feature_description FROM signature_features WHERE feature_id < 10;
SELECT user_id, authentication_time FROM authentication_logs WHERE authentication_result = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, signature_features FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT signature_id, signature_data FROM signatures WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT username, authentication_time FROM users JOIN authentication_logs ON users.user_id = authentication_logs.user_id;
SELECT feature_name, feature_description FROM signature_features WHERE feature_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT signature_id, signature_data FROM signatures WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS signature_count FROM signatures GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT s.signature_id, sh.action, u.username FROM signatures s JOIN signature_history sh ON s.signature_id = sh.signature_id JOIN users u ON u.user_id = sh.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT s.signature_id, u.username FROM signatures s JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT * FROM signature_features WHERE feature_data ->> 'type' = 'handwritten';
SELECT u.username, sh.action, sl.timestamp FROM users u JOIN signature_history sh ON u.user_id = sh.user_id LEFT JOIN authentication_logs sl ON u.user_id = sl.user_id ORDER BY sh.timestamp DESC;
